meta.content: United Community School is a K-8 public charter school located in the University Area. At UCS, a huge emphasis is placed on hands-on learning, best instructional practices, and arts-integration. Learning is promoted through field trips, the arts, community partnerships, & other engaging experiences.

h1.span: United Community School is a K-8 public charter school located in the University Area. At UCS, a huge emphasis is placed on hands-on learning, best instructional practices, and arts-integration. Learning is promoted through field trips, the arts, community partnerships, and other engaging experiences.
